ConnectorPane Methods

Requires: VI Scripting

View the class hierarchy.

MethodDescription
Assign Control To TerminalAssigns a front panel control to a connector pane terminal of the VI. Details
Disconnect All TerminalsDisconnects all connector pane terminals from controls and indicators. Details
Disconnect TerminalDisconnects a connector pane terminal from a control or an indicator. Details
Flip HorizontalFlips the connector pane horizontally. Details
Flip VerticalFlips the connector pane vertically. Details
Rotate By 90Rotates the connector pane counter-clockwise by 90 degrees. Details
Wiring Rule:GetGets the wiring properties of a connector pane terminal. Details
Wiring Rule:SetSets the wiring properties of a connector pane terminal. Details
